pages.text: There would be three new woods in the would, they generate in different biomes. Their leaves can grow fruits below it.
Walnut tree grows in froests, can be used as wood and make oil.
Fig trees grows in plains. Breaking its chunks only yields sticks. Figs are just fruit.
Wolfberry trees grows in windswept mountains.Also, breaking its chunks only yields sticks. Wolfberries are fruits but can also be used to cook.
